about_the_game:
Another World of Freezing that never existed in history: 'Freezing WHAT IF...'

A virtual history of the popular battle heroine manga [Freezing], reimagined as a multiverse and brought to life in a game!

One day, humanity was invaded by "Nova," beings from another dimension, plunging the world into an unprecedented crisis.

Using their unique ability called "Freezing," Nova immobilized time and space, rendering humanity's weapons useless while threatening mass extinction with their devastating self-destruct mechanism.

In response, humanity created [Pandoras], chosen girls with extraordinary powers far beyond human limits,

and [Limiters], chosen boys who can neutralize Nova's Freezing ability and amplify the Pandoras' powers.

Together, they became humanity's last line of resistance against Nova.

However, despite their efforts, humanity suffered a catastrophic defeat at the hands of Nova, seemingly beyond recovery.

Many Limiters perished, while the Pandoras, humanity's last hope, succumbed to mental corruption from Nova, leading to amnesia or berserk behavior, accelerating humanity's march toward extinction.

Amidst this chaos, you are entrusted with leading the remaining human forces against Nova.

As a Limiter with the rare ability to empathize with multiple Pandoras at once,

you offer humanity a renewed hope to stand against Nova once more.

You must manage and develop the remaining human territories, building strength and forces to counter Nova.

You must also locate scattered Pandoras, revive them with all your might, and unite to fight the threat of Nova.

Through a combination of strategy simulation and turn-based battle RPG systems,

experience a brand-new "What If...?" take on the world of Freezing, different from the original!

[The Threat to Humanity, Nova]

[The Hope of Humanity, Pandora]

And... your story, carrying the fate of the world, begins here!

《 Stand Against Nova as the Commander of the Resistance! 》

Secure and develop bases to grow your power.

Resist Nova's relentless invasions.

《 Awaken Pandoras as a Limiter and Lead Them in Battle! 》

Use your unique ability of mental empathy to strengthen Pandoras and wield the special technique, Freezing.

Support and command Pandoras with your Limiter powers to lead them to victory.

Enjoy diverse battle scenes, featuring each Pandora's unique skills and costume destruction effects.

《 Rescue and Awaken Missing Pandoras to Join Your Ranks!! 》

Find Pandoras who went missing during the last Nova invasion and save them from mental corruption.

They will once again stand with you as humanity's protectors.

content_descriptors.notes: This content may include outfits with exposure and occasional partial nudity that may not be suitable for all ages.
